column1: Sarai Akil is a town and a nagar panchayat in Kaushambi district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.

column2: the India census recorded that Sarai Akil had a population of 15
column3: 719. Males constituted 54% of the population and females 46%. Sarai Akil had an average literacy rate of 48%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy was 55% and female literacy was 39%. In Sarai Akil
column5: 16% of the population was under 6 years of age.
